review.findings: ERR-004 fix: chunked Claude PTY writes (192-byte segments, clamped 128-256) + Home key cursor reset + fingerprint logging. Chunking logic correct (no off-by-one), inter-chunk yield (2ms) doesn't race with Enter (50ms after last chunk). Gemini/Codex paths verified untouched. Home key \x1b[H correct ANSI but needs runtime verification in ink TUI (may be no-op, harmlessly ignored). Tests cover chunk boundaries, fingerprint, failure paths. 107 suites, 3249 tests all passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
